chargeHist.descr: Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (5th or 6th)

result.execSummary:
The defendant William Fredrick Buchko Sr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (5th or 6th), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: In lieu of payment and costs 35 days jail concurrent with 07CF1950 and 12CF1376
Consecutive to sentence now serving in 07CF1950 and 12CF1376

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: IT IS ORDERED that the department of Corrections will effectuate the change from Confinement to Extended Supervision determining the actual number of days served in Confinement and changing the remaining Confinement to Extended Supervision. The number of days  will be determined by Department of Corrections Records Office staff and will be based upon actual release date. IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Warden/Superintendent of the institution to which the defendant is assigned shall effect the defendant's release within 6 working days upon receipt of this order.

ADDRESS INFO for William Fredrick Buchko Sr.
Current: 100 Correctional Institution, Stanley Correctional William Buchko #336313, Stanley, WI 54768 United States  (Effective: 12-01-2016)
Prior: 309 East Memorial Drive, #105, Janesville, WI 53545

Defendant William Fredrick Buchko in court with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Mark M. Jahnke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant pleads guilty. Court finds the defendant guilty. Court orders 1 year 6 months WSP and 1 year and 6 months to extended supervision. Consecutive to sentence now serving in case 07CF1950 and 12CF1376. In lieu of fine 35 days jail concurrent with 07CF1950 and 12CF1376 and 30 months drivers license revoked.

Defendant William Fredrick Buchko in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by court, jury trial to be set.  Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2015 at 08:00 am.

Defendant William Fredrick Buchko in court in custody with attorney Vanessa Pasture.  Gwanny J. Tjoa appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 7, 2015 at 08:45 am.

Defendant William Fredrick Buchko in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Gwanny J. Tjoa appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 30, 2015 at 04:00 pm.

Defendant William Fredrick Buchko in court in custody with attorney Sean Drury.  Mark M. Jahnke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond of $2500 set. Adjourned initial appearance for 9-24-15 at 4:00pm.
